general.gigTitle: build full stack website development as full stack developer, frontend developer

sellerCard.description:
Hey there. We're “Stack Squad” , a Full Stack Web Development team with 4 years of experience creating business website, eCommerce stores and custom web applications. We specialize in using modern technologies like React, PHP, Laravel and Node. js to deliver fast, secure and user friendly websites.
Our expertise ranges from building sleek portfolio sites to complex eCommerce platforms, and we've successfully helped startups, businesses, and entrepreneurs worldwide. Whether you're looking to build a new site or improve an existing one, we're ready to bring your vision to life.
Reach out today

description.content:
Your One-Stop Solution to Website Development


I'm a seasoned custom web developer, react front end developer and full stack developer with over 4 years + of experience, specializing in efficient, user-focused custom website development. Whether you need to build, rebuild website from scratch or Figma, I can create a fully functional, responsive, and SEO-friendly site.


Services I Offer:


  • Full-Stack Development: Need a dynamic web app? I have got you covered with React (ReactJS), NodeJS and NextJS


  • Custom Web Design: I'll make your website look great and easy to use with HTML, CSS and JavaScript


  • E-commerce Solutions: Setting up secure online stores with React (ReactJS), NodeJS, Python (Django/Flask), NextJS and JavaScript


  • Performance Optimization.


Technologies I Used:


Frontend: HTML/CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Typescript, React,Next JS


Frameworks: Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Custom CSS/SCSS


Backend: PHP Laravel, Node JS, Express JS, API integrations, API development


Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Deployment: Vercel ,Netlify , AWS


Why my Service?


  • Quality Work, Clean Code & On-time Delivery


  • Fluent English & Live Zoom Meetings


  • 24/7 Quick Support

﻿

  • Unlimited Revisions

﻿

questionsAndAnswers.question: What we need to get started ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We need your business information, your logo, content (if available) , a sample website that you really like . and we are ready to start.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Simply share your Figma design files and any specific requirements. I'll take care of the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don’t have the content for my website yet, can you start developing the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you don't have the content at the moment, we can use dummy content that you can ask to replace with your actual content later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i contact you before placing order to discuss my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, don't hesitate, feel free to contact me. I will be happy to assist you

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to build or rebuild a full stack website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project, the features required, and the overall scope. Typically, a standard full stack website can take anywhere from a few weeks to several months. I’ll provide a more accurate estimate after discussing your specific needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use for Full Stack Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Depending on the project's requirements, I employ a range of technologies. Typically, the frontend technologies include React.js or Next.js, while the backend uses Node.js and Express.js. The database is managed using MongoDB.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What services are included in this gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: UI/UX design - Frontend development - Backend development - Database integration - API development and integration - Testing and debugging - Deployment and maintenance

questionsAndAnswers.question: What types of websites can you build?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can build various types of websites, including custom websites, e-commerce platforms, and Figma to WordPress or HTML/CSS conversions. Whether you need a new site or a redesign, I focus on creating functional, responsive, and SEO-friendly solutions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What about site progress revisions and modifications?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: After placing the order I will start working on it, I'll keep updating you with the progress. Yes! you can ask for unlimited revisions. Once we get done with all changes. I will shift the website to your domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if i m not happy with the quality and design ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide unlimited revisions to our clients, and always deliver what is requested .we will work till you get 100% satisfaction, still if you are not happy, we will refund you.

packageList.title: Figma to Custom Website Conversion
packageList.description: Convert your PSD,XD,Sketch,PNG or FIGMA design to Reactjs, Nextjs, Clean Code (1-3 pages )

packageList.title: Custom Website Development
packageList.description: Build Dynamic, Responsive Custom Website from Figma to Reactjs, Nextjs ( 5-8 Pages )

packageList.title: Premium Business Website
packageList.description: Build Dynamic, Full Stack Custom Website + Provided API or Firebase Integration ( 8-10 Pages )

reviews.comment: Stacksqaud team truly impressed in the Website Development project with their exceptional communication and proactive updates. The delivery was swift, coupled with strong, detailed code that EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS and demonstrated great attention to detail. Working with them was a pleasure, thanks to his politeness and commitment—an outstanding experience!

Working with Stacksquad was a game-changer for our project. They completely nailed the front-end design, delivering a sleek and intuitive interface that perfectly captured our vision. The platform is now not only visually stunning but also incredibly functional and user-friendly. What stood out most was their attention to detail, creativity, and ability to understand exactly what we needed—even before we asked. On top of that, their technical expertise and problem-solving skills were exceptional, making the entire process seamless. If you're looking for a team that delivers both high-quality design and solid development, Stacksquad is the way to go. Can’t recommend them enough!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback ! Its been a pleasure working with you

reviews.comment: Collaborating with Stacksquad on my website was an exceptional experience. Their skill and commitment to the project were evident at every stage. They handled all aspects with great professionalism, going beyond my expectations to ensure all requirements were fulfilled. Stacksquad is remarkably attentive, approachable, and quick to resolve even minor concerns. Their comprehensive knowledge of web development, paired with their ability to implement practical solutions, makes them an outstanding choice for any project. What impressed me most was their dedication to understanding my needs and delivering a seamless final product. I highly recommend them!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback ! Its been a pleasure working with you

reviews.comment: Ali did an EXCELLENT job on the website development project, showcasing true professionalism, meticulous attention to detail, and great documentation. Working with them was a breeze—they were polite, super responsive, and delivered everything on time. Highly recommend! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback ! It's been a pleasure working with you 😊

reviews_snippet.comment: I am absolutely thrilled with Ali's work! He was incredibly accommodating, professional, and attentive to every detail. His work exceeded my expectations by far, delivering results that were not only on point but also innovative and tailored perfectly to my needs. I cannot recommend him highly enough. If you're looking for someone who is reliable, talented, and a pleasure to work with, he is the one to go to!
Shahzad has a level of dedication not present in many of the developers on this network. I appreciate his quality work and look forward to working with him more.

I want to warmly thank Stacksquad for their outstanding work on my SaaS project. Their initiative, attention to detail, and ability to provide insightful suggestions went above and beyond my expectations. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a proactive and skilled professional on Fiverr

This is the second time I’ve worked with Ali, and I am extremely satisfied with his work. He is highly professional, reliable, and delivers exceptional results. Communication was smooth, and he completed the project on time with great attention to detail. I highly recommend Ali to anyone looking for quality programming work. I look forward to collaborating with him again in the future!

Stacksquad never disappoints when it comes to delivering high-quality work. Their expertise in coding and backend development is unmatched—they’re the go-to professionals for any project. Thanks again for another successful delivery, Stacksquad!
